Reach
Whenever one or more creatures attack you or a planeswalker you control, up to one other Human creature you control gains reach until end of turn.

Imperious Mourner can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

• Put target card that has an Adventure an opponent owns from exile into that player’s graveyard.

When Belfebe, Faerie Queen enters the battlefield, exile the top card of each player’s library and a card at random from each player’s graveyard.

{W}{U} ARTIFACTS Defend the realm with fabled relics of old.
{U}{B} COUNTERS Show your knightly prowess with +1/+1 counters.
{B}{R} GRAVEYARD Honor the fables of the past and care about the graveyard.
{R}{G} BIG ADVENTURE Ramp towards a big finale with adventure cards.
{G}{W} HUMANS Honor the knightly courts and gather your Human troops.
{W}{B} LIFEGAIN Eat, drink, and be merry with rewards for gaining life.
{B}{G} MORBID Not all fairy tales have a happy ending. Make death memorable.
{G}{U} ENCHANTMENTS Defend the Green Knight with an enchanting presence.
{U}{R} NON-HUMANS All sorts of creatures inhabit the magical wilds. Gather them together to win.
{R}{W} AGGRO ADVENTURE Bring ruin to your enemies quickly, with adventures keeping the pressure on.

cards.rules_text:
Royal Court enters the battlefield tapped. As it does, choose Plains or Island. Royal Court is the chosen land type.
As long as Royal Court is a Plains, you may spend {C} as thought it were {W}.
As long as Royal Court is an Island, you may spend {C} as though it were {U}.

Hearty Furnace enters the battlefield tapped. As it does, choose Swamp or Mountain. Hearty Furnace is the chosen land type.
As long as Hearty Furnace is a Swamp, you may spend {C} as thought it were {B}.
As long as Hearty Furnace is a Mountain, you may spend {C} as though it were {R}.

King’s Lounge enters the battlefield tapped. As it does, choose Mountain or Forest. King’s Lounge is the chosen land type.
As long as King’s Lounge is a Mountain, you may spend {C} as thought it were {R}.
As long as King’s Lounge is a Forest, you may spend {C} as though it were {G}.

Halls of Power enters the battlefield tapped. As it does, choose Forest or Plains. Halls of Power is the chosen land type.
As long as Halls of Power is a Forest, you may spend {C} as though it were {G}.
As long as Halls of Power is a Plains, you may spend {C} as thought it were {W}.

Private Chambers enters the battlefield tapped. As it does, choose Island or Swamp. Private Chambers is the chosen land type.
As long as Private Chambers is an Island you may spend {C} as thought it were {U}.
As long as Private Chambers is a Swamp, you may spend {C} as though it were {B}.
